Augmented Flow Observations
Claim 2. Augmented flow obeys flow conservation:
in flow fin = out flow fout for all v V — {s, t}.
Inflow & outflows are only changed by bottleneck
capacity b for vertices on the augmenting path P.
For such a v E P, there are four cases (in Gf):
Forward edge out of v
rout b
Reverse edge out of v
Forward edge into v
Both increase by b
No change
Reverse edge into v
= fout —b
NO change
Both decrease by b
